programme.title: United Fight Alliance
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance presents Shamrock 332 from Ameristar Casino in St. Charles, Mo. UFC and Bellator Veteran Bobby Voelker steps back into the ShamrockFC cage and top Bantamweight prospect Garrett Armfield looks to continue his win streak.

programme.title: United Fight Alliance
programme.desc: United Fight Alliance features top-ranked fighters, up and coming fighters, intense action and footage from some of the biggest names in combat sports and exclusive content spanning MMA, boxing, kickboxing, bare knuckle boxing, muay thai and more.
